Entries.Mon8: Oh. It's nice to see you, @!$h
Entries.Mon10: Hi, @! It's... it's nice to see you!$4
Entries.Tue10: Oh... it's nice of you to stop by, @.$h#$e#No, I'm not too busy... it's been a slow week so far.
Entries.Wed8: Oh! Uh... hi, @. I didn't hear you come in.$4#$e#What do you think of the weather lately...?
Entries.Wed10: Need a tool upgraded?#$e#No...? Oh... you just came to say hi?$4
Entries.Thu10: Hi, @! I'm happy you're here.$h#$e#It was getting a little lonely in here.
Entries.Fri8: Uh... any plans for the weekend, @?$4
Entries.Fri10: It's Friday... so that's good!#$e#The weekends are always nice...$h
Entries.Sat10: You even come by on the weekends...$s#$e#Sorry... I just don't understand why.$4
Entries.Sun10: Well, it's another busy week tomorrow.#$e#Good luck, @.$h
Entries.event_blacksmith1: Um, okay. Great. Sorry, just give me a second...$s
Entries.event_blacksmith2: Really? Great. Let me just grab my order sheet...
Entries.event_sadclint1: O-oh. Thank you, @. That... that means a lot.$4
Entries.event_sadclint2: You too, huh?$s#$b#Well... maybe we can be sad and lonely together.$h
Entries.event_iron1: W-well, I don't come here too often...$s
Entries.event_iron2: Uh, I, uh... I just finished up...$s#$b#Phew! I'm all tired out...$h

Entries.give_flowersA: Flowers...for me...$9#$b#I had no idea you felt that way... I accept!$4#$b#...I guess this means I'm your boyfriend...$h
Entries.give_flowersB: Really? Even after how I ignored you in favor of Emily?$9#$b#Absolutely. I never would have thought...$4#$b#I'm so happy to be your boyfriend.$h
Entries.give_pendant: ...! I...are you serious? Yes!$11#$b#This is too good to be true... I'm not sure I didn't accidentally give myself a concussion with my tools, but...$6#$b#I'm so happy. I'll talk to the mayor. Everything should be ready in three days.
Entries.stardrop_gift: @, my gem, you have always been so good to me.$4#$b#I thought that this stardrop would be a wonderful way to show my affection and gratitude.$1#$b#Thank you so much, my jewel of a husband.$4^Thank you so much, my jewel of a wife.$4
Entries.rejectNPCA: ...$9#$e#%Clint is frozen... I don't think he knows what to do....
Entries.rejectNPCB: ...$9#$e#%Clint is frozen... I don't think he knows what to do....
Entries.reject_four_heartA: I'm sorry... I like someone else.$4
Entries.reject_four_heartB: Oh... I mean.. well...$8#$b#I think we should just be friends.$2
Entries.marriedB: I'm sure %spouse is at home being faithful to you.  You should do the same.$3
Entries.refusal_botherB: Stop it. I've made myself clear.$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Duuhhhhhhhh$9#$b#%Clint cannot even say yes or no...
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: Duuhhhhhhhh$9#$b#%Clint cannot even say yes or no...

Entries.give_flowersA: Flowers... they still don't compare to you, gem.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: I'm very glad you asked me out. I never would have imagined our life now.$4
Entries.give_pendant: Did you just have more than one on hand?.$9
Entries.engageA: I... think it would send the wrong message if I wore more than one.$9
Entries.engageB: I only need the one, my gem.$4
Entries.marriedA: We're already happily married. I don't need more proof of our love.$h
Entries.marriedB: Where did you get another, gem?$9

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: Hey, love.#$e#It's raining cats and dogs today. Please make sure you don't get drenched!#$e#I wouldn't want you to catch a cold.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Good morning, dear.#$e#I made you some coffee to keep you warm! [395]
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Oh... hey love.#$e# I just took a peek outside... it seems today'll be a rainy day.#$e#I hope you don't mind if I stay inside.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: *sigh*... Hey @, it's raining again.#$e#I'm just gonna stay in here and listen to some blues, alright?
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: Morning, my gem!#$e#Here, I made you a nice, hearty breakfast. [194 195 210 211 216]#$e#You're sure gonna need it if you're planning on going out in this weather!
Entries.Rainy_Day_Clint: Hey, love.#$e#It's raining cats and dogs today. Please make sure you don't get drenched!#$e#I wouldn't want you to catch a cold.
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Hey, @. That's quite a storm out there, huh?#$e# I'm happy you're home now.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: Love, you're drenched! You must be freezing!#$e#C'mere and let this famous dish of mine warm you up! [199]
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: *sigh*... I hope we're gonna have some sunshine tomorrow, love!#$e#These rainy days always make me feel kinda gloomy.
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: Hey, look who's home!#$e#I rearranged my blues collection today, love.#$e# I didn't really feel like going out in that rain.
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: How was your day, gem? I hope you didn't catch a cold out there!#$e#Here, have a cup of coffee with me! [395]
Entries.Rainy_Night_Clint: How was your day, gem? I hope you didn't catch a cold out there!#$e#Here, have a cup of coffee with me! [395]
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Good morning, dear.#$e#Did you sleep well?#$e#I hope my snoring didn't wake you up last night.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey, @. How about some pancakes?#$e#I just finished making a batch... Though I doubt they will be as good as yours! [211]
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Do you have any special plans for today, love?#$e#Huh? Me?... Oh, I guess I'll just listen to some blues for now.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Look, @. I made you some breakfast. After all you're working almost as hard as I am.#$e#Just kidding! I really do appreciate your hard work, love. [194 195 210 211 216]$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Good morning, love! Do you want some cake?#$e# I know, cake for breakfast... sounds kinda... weird, huh?#$e#But I really wanted to impress you! [220 221]$4
Entries.Indoor_Day_Clint: Hey, @. How about some pancakes?#$e#I just finished making a batch... Though I doubt they will be as good as yours! [211]
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Hey, there you are!#$e#I was just wondering when you'd come home. Did you have a nice day?
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Here, have some soup, love.#$e#I wouldn't want you to starve on me!#$e#Honestly now, dear. Eat up while it's still hot. [199 218 219 727 730]
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: *yawn*... Oh, hey gem.#$e#No, I didn't stay up just to welcome you home... or maybe I did?!#$e#Anyways, let's call it a night, shall we?$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: You're looking really exhausted, dear. Are you alright?#$e#Do you... would you... *gulp*... Wanna have me massage your back?$4
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Back at my old place I used to stay inside all day, constantly working on tools or smelting ore.#$e# Living out here with you is a welcome change!$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_Clint: Hey, there you are!#$e#I was just wondering when you'd come home. Did you have a nice day?
Entries.Outdoor_0: You really are doing a great job, love!#$e#But please don't overwork yourself.#$e#I like my men square and healthy!$4^I like my women square and healthy!$4
Entries.Outdoor_1: Ah... what a lovely day!#$e#I'm feeling much better since I moved in with you.#$e#Farm life really is refreshing!$h
Entries.Outdoor_2: Hey, gem. What are you up to?#$e#You know, I really appreciate living out here with you. It's much nicer than living at the workshop.
Entries.Outdoor_3: I've never been a huge fan of having pets, but %pet has changed my mind.#$e#You raised them well!
Entries.Outdoor_Clint: You really are doing a great job, love!#$e#But please don't overwork yourself.#$e#I like my men square and healthy!$4^I like my women square and healthy!$4
Entries.OneKid_0: *gulp* I am a dad!... I can't believe it. Hopefully I will do better than my own father.$2#$e#Don't you worry, @. %kid1 is going to have the perfect childhood.#$e#I'll make sure of that.$h
Entries.OneKid_1: Look at our little gem. I never thought I'd be able to say this, but we have a wonderful little family.$h#$e#*sigh* If only Mom could've seen this.$2
Entries.OneKid_2: %kid1 reminds me so much of myself when I was a kid.#$e#Now, don't worry, dear. I won't force %kid1 to follow in my footsteps.#$e#Yours seem much more appealing anyway!$h
Entries.OneKid_3: With parenthood comes great responsibility! I'm glad we're in this together, @!$h
Entries.TwoKids_0: Our kids are precious, aren't they, love?
Entries.TwoKids_1: We've come so far, haven't we, @?#$e#I always wanted my own little family, but I never really dared to hope for it.$4
Entries.TwoKids_2: Do you think the kids are happy?#$e# Sometimes I can't help but worry I'll let you all down, just like my own father.$2#$e#No, you're right, love. I'm nothing like him.$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: It's great! There're two of the little ones now!#$e#That way, they'll never be lonely.#$e#As an only child I know what I'm talking about!$h
Entries.Good_0: I... I wasn't staring, love. I was merely admiring you.$4#$e#You really are a sight to behold!$h
Entries.Good_1: @, I just... I... I wanted to let you now that I love you. You've dug me out of that hole I'd buried myself in for so many years.#$e#Thank you!$h
Entries.Good_2: *sigh* What did I do to deserve you, gem? I'm just a boring old blacksmith.$h#$e#Well... now I'm your boring old blacksmith.$4#$e#I love you, dear!$h
Entries.Good_3: May I steal a kiss, my dear?#$e#You could also get one in return... if you want.$4
Entries.Good_4: Sometimes I can't help but wonder why you chose me of all people.#$e#Regardless, I'll always try my best so you never regret handing me that bouquet.$h
Entries.Good_5: Hey, @. You remember what I once told you about my father?#$e# How he tried to turn me into someone else?$s#$e#I'm just so glad that you'll never try to change me.$h
Entries.Good_6: I know that I must have seemed like a grumpy loner when we first met, gem. Always bothering you to upgrade your tools.#$e#I guess I was just too shy to approach you properly.#$e#Thank Yoba you had enough courage for the both of us.$4
Entries.Good_7: Love, I... uhm... about Emily...#$e#I... I feel foolish for what I did back then.$s#$e#But don't you worry. It was just a crush and it's all in the past now!$h
Entries.Neutral_0: Oh, hey dear. I guess we'll have to do some shopping pretty soon.#$e#The fridge looks kinda empty.
Entries.Neutral_1: Do you think I've lost weight?#$e#Well, if I did it's thanks to your healthy cooking.$h
Entries.Neutral_2: It's a great thing you know how to cook so well. I've always had a healthy appetite.$h
Entries.Neutral_3: I'm starving! I think I'm gonna raid the fridge!
Entries.Neutral_4: Working as a blacksmith really is a tiring job...#$e#Farming has so much more to offer!$h
Entries.Neutral_5: Have you ever watched Queen of Sauce, dear?#$e#It's really taught me some things!
Entries.Neutral_6: Iridium is by far the most durable material. If only it wasn't so hard to find.
Entries.Bad_0: Please, just... just leave me be!$3#$e# I don't wanna talk right now...$s
Entries.Bad_2: Did I... did I do something wrong?$s#$e# Why are you treating me like this? I thought we were happy...$s
Entries.Bad_3: I can't believe you're trying to change me, too.$3#$e#I thought you were different...$s#$e#I thought you cared.$3
Entries.Bad_4: It's... it's just...$3#$e#Maybe I'm just misreading things, but it feels like we're falling apart...$s
Entries.funLeave_Clint: Sorry, dear. Work is calling.#$e#People still need my services after all.$h#$e#But I'll be home before you know it.$h
Entries.funReturn_Clint: Hey, gem. I'm home!$h#$e#*sigh* Feels good to be home!$h#$e#I missed you.$4
Entries.spring_Clint: Sure, spring's pretty and all, but it gets my allergies in a fuss...
Entries.spring_1: Happy New Year, my love.$h#$e#I'm happy I'll get to spend it with you!$4
Entries.spring_12: You're gonna win the egg hunt tomorrow, right, dear?#$e#I'd love to have a big omelette tomorrow night.$h
Entries.spring_23: You know I always felt lonely watching all those happy couples dancing.#$e#But not this year! This year I'll be one of them.$4
Entries.summer_Clint: Phew! It's hot...#$e#Summers out here on the countryside can be suffocating...#$e#Good thing we have plenty of trees for shade!$h
Entries.summer_1: Phew... This heat is killing me.#$e#It's almost like working near the furnace all day.#$e#Summer's not my favorite season, love.$s
Entries.summer_10: I can't really give you any advice on what to put in the luau soup, sorry dear.#$e# You're the better chef.#$e#But I'm sure you'll choose something that will rock the governor's socks off!$h
Entries.summer_27: As a secret romantic, I always loved watching the moon jellies.#$e#I just didn't have anyone to share it with... until you came around!$h
Entries.fall_Clint: Ah... it's finally cooling off.#$e#I love the fall.$h
Entries.fall_1: Fall is finally here! The leaves always remind me of the gems and crystals in the mines.#$e#You know what I mean, right, love?$h
Entries.fall_15: You won't mind if I eat a little more than usual at the fair tomorrow, would you?#$e#I swear, I still like your cooking the best! But Gus' only comes around so often.$h
Entries.fall_26: You might not know this, @, but All Spirit's Eve actually makes me nervous...$s#$e#After all it's me who's responsible for setting up the cage to keep Marlon's skeletons at bay!
Entries.winter_Clint: It's a little cold out, sure, but isn't the snow pretty?
Entries.winter_1: Winter's here, gem.#$e# Don't worry, this old blacksmith is gonna keep you warm!$h
Entries.winter_7: *gulp* H...Hey... love?#$e#Please don't... don't laugh at me, but will you build a snowman with me tomorrow?$4#$e#In return I'll cheer for you as loud as I can at the fishing contest!$h
Entries.winter_24: Are you excited about the gift exchange tomorrow?#$e#I'll be crossing my fingers you'll get something nice.$h
Entries.winter_28: Another year is almost over.#$e# I'm so happy I got to spend it with you, @!$h#$e#Here, sweetie. Cheers! [346]
Entries.spouseRoom_Clint: #$c .5#I'm still working on setting up all my tools here.#$e#I'm hoping to open my shop out of here pretty soon, if it's okay with you, dear.
Entries.patio_Clint: I'm trying to get my tools organized... When did I end up with all this junk?$s

Entries.marriage_Mon.000: Oh! Hi, honey. I'm working today, but I'll be home soon enough.
Entries.marriage_Wed.000: Hi there, love. Need a tool upgrade?
Entries.marriage_Fri.000: Thanks for visiting me at work, honey. It means a lot!

Entries.Clint0: We're going to get married...$4#$e#Isn't it exciting... honey?$h
Entries.Clint1: I... I promise I'll do my best to try and make you happy, @!$4#$e#You can count on me.$h

Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Clint_NotSpouse: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. I think I blew my back out, dragging you all the way up here.#$b#Be a little more careful next time, okay?$s
Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Clint_Spouse: ...I found you unconscious in the mines, my gem...$s#$b#I was so worried! Please be more careful...$s

Entries.winter_6_1: I've got an unusual request. Could you keep this a secret?^ I want you to deliver an amethyst to Emily. It's her favorite stone. Tell her it's from me.^  -Clint %item quest 110 %% [#]Clint's Unusual Request
Entries.emilythyst: Oh. Almost forgot. Here you go.^^  -Clint %item object 66 1 %%

Entries.winter_6_1: I've got an unusual request, @. But I know you won't judge me for it.^ I want you to deliver an amethyst to Emily. It's her favorite stone. And she's been a good friend to me.^    -Clint %item quest 110 %% [#]Clint's Unusual Request

I get I should have asked you this in person, but I've got an unusual request, my gem.^ I want you to deliver an amethyst to Emily. Yes... the woman I used to like. It's her favorite stone. And she's been a good friend to me.^ Say it's from the two of us, won't you?^   -Clint %item quest 110 %% [#]Clint's Unusual Request
